description: doom +‎ -er. The more recent sense was popularized via a meme, “30 Year-Old Boomer”. The derivations of which are other words that end in -oomer, describing various personality types.

entries.meaning: One who believes that petroleum depletion will inevitably lead to a severe recession or depression, followed by a Malthusian catastrophe.
(neologism, sometimes capitalized) Someone who is apathetic or has a negative prospect towards the world, especially in relation to climate change.
(rare) One who, or that which, dooms.
